thread.title: Debrand your Huawei P9 to Immediately Update to Android 7.0 Nougat
thread.title_full: Debrand your Huawei P9 to Immediately Update to Android 7.0 Nougat

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: Debrand your Huawei P9 to Immediately Update to Android 7.0 Nougat
text: One of the disadvantages of purchasing a particular carrier branded model of a device is having to wait for official updates to reach your device, despite the fact that the device models are otherwise identical. XDA Senior Member Z-Blade has created a thread with instructions on how to debrand your Huawei P9 so you can immediately update to the latest update based on Android Nougat.
